 LEGO Harry Potter will allow gamers to play as LEGO versions of Harry Potter,
 Ron Weasley, Hermione Granger, and other characters from the books during
 their first four years at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry.Players
 will be able to attend lessons, cast spells, mix potions, fly on broomsticks,
 and complete tasks to earn house points in Hogwarts Castle, and visit
 familiar settings like Diagon Alley, the Forbidden Forest, and the village of
 Hogsmeade.
